column1: Comparison of narrow type with wide type in loop condition
column2: Comparisons between types of different widths in a loop condition can cause the loop to behave unexpectedly.
column4: Comparison between [["i"|"relative:///subsys/bluetooth/host/gatt.c:1189:16:1189:16"]] of type uint16_t and [["attr_count"|"relative:///include/bluetooth/gatt.h:161:9:161:18"]] of wider type size_t.
